pullRequest.title: Workaround for loss of switch disconnect event
pullRequest.bodyText:
Reimplementation loss of switch disconnect event handling to avoid
unintended offline of all switches (and down of all flows) on network
topology replug.

nodes.bodyText: Could you revise the name? It's not obvious what "dumpGeneration", "actualGeneration" and "OfflineGenerationLag" in the context of SwitchFsm.
Could you add some javadoc with description what this class is for?
